abstract: Five stories as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop.
description: These five stories were created by members of the general public as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop at ACMI. On the most part, the stories are tributes to the people in the participants families that have been important or inspiring them. They employ a variety of storytelling techniques that best convey the emotion and intention of the stories.
